header.title: Parse data from documents In {{ProgLang}}

about.title: Parse Data with Templates in {{ProductFullName}}
about.p1: Templates can greatly enhance the efficiency, accuracy, and consistency of data extraction from documents. {{ProductFullName}} provides a powerful solution for working with templates.
about.p2: With {{ProductFullName}}, you can easily create templates for different types of documents, including PDFs and Microsoft Word documents. You can also use templates for batch parsing of multiple documents.
about.p3: Best practices for working with templates in {{ProductFullName}} include using unique identifiers and testing templates thoroughly before deployment. With {{ProductFullName}}, you can optimize data extraction and achieve better results.
about.p4: Download and try {{ProductFullName}} today to simplify your document parsing tasks and improve your productivity. Our documentation and support resources are available to help you get started and achieve success.
about.p5: Learn more about document parsing in [documentation](https://docs.groupdocs.com/parser/{{ProductCode}}/working-with-templates/).

content_left.description: {{ProductFullName}} APIs are supported on all major platforms and operating systems. Before executing the code below, please make sure that you have the following prerequisites installed on your system.
content_left.step_1: Operating Systems: Microsoft Windows, Linux, MacOS
content_left.step_4: Download the latest version of {{ProductFullName}} from [{{RepoName}}]({{RepoUrl}})

content_right.p1: Plain text extraction support from any supported documents
content_right.p4: Text searching via keyword as well as regular expression
content_right.p5: Extract formatted text, metadata, images, containers, and attachments
content_right.p6: Extract table of contents for some supported document formats
content_right.p7: Parse form data from PDF documents
